The difference between these quantities is the number of cookies baked on the intervening day: 270 (today) - 31 (yesterday) = 239. The total number of cookies baked since the day before yesterday was given as 419, so the number of cookies baked the day before yesterday can be calculated as follows: 419 (total) - 31 (yesterday) - 239 (intervening day) = 49. The answer is: 49.
